config.explayerenderer.title: Extra Player Renderer Settings
config.explayerenderer.spectator_auto_sw:
Automatically switch entity model in spectator mode.

Overrides §2Player Name§r option if enabled.
config.explayerenderer.player_name.desc: The name of the player to render. It will be your name in default.
config.explayerenderer.pose_offset_metho:
Method of offsetting player's position when the player changes its pose.

§eAuto§r
    Adjust height according to the height of entity's eyes.
§eManual§r
    Manually set the offset when sneaking, swimming, using elytra and crawling.
§eStanding§r
    Only renders in standing pose.
§eDisabled§r
    No offset.
config.explayerenderer.sneaking_y_offset:
Y offset when player is sneaking.

Works only when §aPosture Offset Method§r is set to §eManual§r.
config.explayerenderer.swim_crawl_y_offs:
Y offset when player is swimming or crawling.

Works only when §aPosture Offset Method§r is set to §eManual§r.
config.explayerenderer.elytra_y_offset.d:
Y offset when player is flying using an elytra.

Works only when §aPosture Offset Method§r is set to §eManual§r.
config.explayerenderer.hurt_flash.desc: If rendered model turns red when player takes damage.
config.explayerenderer.swing_hands.desc: If the rendered hands swing when trying to break blocks.
config.explayerenderer.light_degree.desc: The degree of light source producing shadow effects.
config.explayerenderer.use_world_light.d: If use the light level in the world to render.
config.explayerenderer.world_light_min.d: Minimum brightness when useWorldLight is enabled.
